Kabbage | Lead DevOps Engineer | Atlanta | Full Time

Lead the Kabbage DevOps team to transform our existing infrastructure into a fully automated environment, evangelizing the concepts of “Infrastructure as Code” and growing the DevOps mindset at Kabbage.

Perks: Unlimited PTO, annual bonus, equity in company, full coverage of individual benefits, daily catered lunches, snacks, beer on tap, cold-brewed coffee, dog-friendly offer, onsite fitness classes, adjustable sit/stand desks, and more.

Read more and apply here: https://www.kabbage.com/company/careers/job/679443
